title: Which is the most underrated 4th generation K-pop group? - Quora

response.answer_text: e'last and d-crunch. e'last all around have amazing vocals and their debut this year was really good, standing out as being mostly vocally driven rather than rap and heavy bass/edm “empty" drops. like their vocals are seriously some of the strongest so people need to stop complaining that 4th gen vocalists are weak cause these guys are no joke. even the rapper can sing. and the vocalists can rap😂they are also quite good dancers but I mean what do you expect, they're atinys😆 d-crunch has been on my radar ever since I saw their rdp in public video like a year ago? idk I just really liked them even though I didn't know them. they debuted last year and the song was a bop though I haven't listened to it too much. however, their recent comeback “pierrot", despite it being an edm drop, I actually really liked it. it wasn't exactly the typical edm drop that sounds like every other song. it was really enjoyable, I loved the rappers' sound and there were some unique vocals too. I thought it was amazing but it feels like it kinda passed everyone by. I'd say d-crunch is more underrated than e'last. it kinda feels like e'last is gaining some attention due to wonhyuk being president atiny and honestly I love that for them. I became their fan because he was such a huge atiny. stan ateez y'all, like no pressure but they're ready for world domination

ENOi!!!  Honestly, I've never heard anyone talk about them before, and it's seriously so sad. They're insanely talented. Here's one of my favourite songs from them (and it was only released 2 weeks ago!) :  Here's one of their choreo videos that I really enjoyed watching. This video is how I found out about them!  Link to their K-profile: ENOi Members Profiles (Updated!) As an ARMY, it's sad to see talented groups like this getting only 40k views on their latest comeback, because I know how BTS started out. I bet that if ENOi was in a bigger company, they would be getting a lot more attention. Please check them out and give them support! :)))
